description: Build systems like make are frequently used to create complicated workflows, e.g. in bioninformatics. This project aims to reduce the complexity of creating workflows by providing a clean and modern domain specific language (DSL) in python style, together with a fast and comfortable execution environment.
longdescription: Build systems like make are frequently used to create complicated workflows, e.g. in bioninformatics. This project aims to reduce the complexity of creating workflows by providing a clean and modern domain specific language (DSL) in python style, together with a fast and comfortable execution environment.
